com.aseproject.map

Class CustomItemizedOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • ItemizedOverlay
      • com.aseproject.map.CustomItemizedOverlay

  • public class CustomItemizedOverlay
extends ItemizedOverlay
    This class creates all the custom items that are pictured on the map.
    Author:
    John Argyriou 2012
